mapper.sql: a.owid AS "owid", a.qyxx_ref_owid AS "qyxxRefOwid", a.zwbt AS "zwbt", a.zwgjz AS "zwgjz", a.zwlx AS "zwlx", a.lmlj AS "lmlj", a.lmbh AS "lmbh", a.zw_pro AS "zwPro", a.zw_city AS "zwCity", a.zw_area AS "zwArea", a.zw_gzzn AS "zwGzzn", a.zw_gzxz AS "zwGzxz", a.zw_xs AS "zwXs", a.zw_lxyx AS "zwLxyx", a.zw_zprs AS "zwZprs", a.zw_nlyq AS "zwNlyq", a.zw_xlyq AS "zwXlyq", a.zw_yyyq AS "zwYyyq", a.zw_gznx AS "zwGznx", a.zw_gwzz AS "zwGwzz", a.zw_gzs AS "zwGzs", a.zw_yds AS "zwYds", a.zw_sxsj AS "zwSxsj", a.zw_mxxy AS "zwMxxy", a.zw_mxzy AS "zwMxzy", a.zph_jbf AS "zphJbf", a.zph_cbf AS "zphCbf", a.zph_jbdd AS "zphJbdd", a.zph_ksrq AS "zphKsrq", a.zph_jtsj AS "zphJtsj", a.zph_sfbm AS "zphSfbm", a.zph_bmjzsj AS "zphBmjzsj", a.zph_sfqd AS "zphSfqd", a.zph_gpsjd AS "zphGpsjd", a.zph_gpswd AS "zphGpswd", a.zph_gpsbj AS "zphGpsbj", a.memo AS "memo", a.createtime AS "createtime", a.creator AS "creator", a.creator_name AS "creatorName", a.lastupdate AS "lastupdate", a.updator AS "updator", a.updator_name AS "updatorName", a.ver AS "ver", a.vertime AS "vertime", a.dept_id AS "deptId", a.dept_path AS "deptPath", a.delflg AS "delflg", a.state AS "state", a.xgfj AS "xgfj", a.exp1 AS "exp1", a.exp2 AS "exp2", a.exp3 AS "exp3", a.exp4 AS "exp4", a.exp5 AS "exp5", a.exp6 AS "exp6", a.exp7 AS "exp7", a.exp8 AS "exp8", a.exp9 AS "exp9", a.exp10 AS "exp10"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bckj_biz_job( owid, qyxx_ref_owid, zwbt, zwgjz, zwlx, lmlj, lmbh, zw_pro, zw_city, zw_area, zw_gzzn, zw_gzxz, zw_xs, zw_lxyx, zw_zprs, zw_nlyq, zw_xlyq, zw_yyyq, zw_gznx, zw_gwzz, zw_gzs, zw_yds, zw_sxsj, zw_mxxy, zw_mxzy, zph_jbf, zph_cbf, zph_jbdd, zph_ksrq, zph_jtsj, zph_sfbm, zph_bmjzsj, zph_sfqd, zph_gpsjd, zph_gpswd, zph_gpsbj, memo, createtime, creator, creator_name, lastupdate, updator, updator_name, ver, vertime, dept_id, dept_path, delflg, state, xgfj, exp1, exp2, exp3, exp4, exp5, exp6, exp7, exp8, exp9, exp10 ) VALUES ( #{owid}, #{qyxxRefOwid}, #{zwbt}, #{zwgjz}, #{zwlx}, #{lmlj}, #{lmbh}, #{zwPro}, #{zwCity}, #{zwArea}, #{zwGzzn}, #{zwGzxz}, #{zwXs}, #{zwLxyx}, #{zwZprs}, #{zwNlyq}, #{zwXlyq}, #{zwYyyq}, #{zwGznx}, #{zwGwzz}, #{zwGzs}, #{zwYds}, #{zwSxsj}, #{zwMxxy}, #{zwMxzy}, #{zphJbf}, #{zphCbf}, #{zphJbdd}, #{zphKsrq}, #{zphJtsj}, #{zphSfbm}, #{zphBmjzsj}, #{zphSfqd}, #{zphGpsjd}, #{zphGpswd}, #{zphGpsbj}, #{memo}, #{createtime}, #{creator}, #{creatorName}, #{lastupdate}, #{updator}, #{updatorName}, #{ver}, #{vertime}, #{deptId}, #{deptPath}, #{delflg}, #{state}, #{xgfj}, #{exp1}, #{exp2}, #{exp3}, #{exp4}, #{exp5}, #{exp6}, #{exp7}, #{exp8}, #{exp9}, #{exp10} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bckj_biz_job SET owid = #{owid}, qyxx_ref_owid = #{qyxxRefOwid}, zwbt = #{zwbt}, zwgjz = #{zwgjz}, zwlx = #{zwlx}, lmlj = #{lmlj}, lmbh = #{lmbh}, zw_pro = #{zwPro}, zw_city = #{zwCity}, zw_area = #{zwArea}, zw_gzzn = #{zwGzzn}, zw_gzxz = #{zwGzxz}, zw_xs = #{zwXs}, zw_lxyx = #{zwLxyx}, zw_zprs = #{zwZprs}, zw_nlyq = #{zwNlyq}, zw_xlyq = #{zwXlyq}, zw_yyyq = #{zwYyyq}, zw_gznx = #{zwGznx}, zw_gwzz = #{zwGwzz}, zw_gzs = #{zwGzs}, zw_yds = #{zwYds}, zw_sxsj = #{zwSxsj}, zw_mxxy = #{zwMxxy}, zw_mxzy = #{zwMxzy}, zph_jbf = #{zphJbf}, zph_cbf = #{zphCbf}, zph_jbdd = #{zphJbdd}, zph_ksrq = #{zphKsrq}, zph_jtsj = #{zphJtsj}, zph_sfbm = #{zphSfbm}, zph_bmjzsj = #{zphBmjzsj}, zph_sfqd = #{zphSfqd}, zph_gpsjd = #{zphGpsjd}, zph_gpswd = #{zphGpswd}, zph_gpsbj = #{zphGpsbj}, memo = #{memo}, createtime = #{createtime}, creator = #{creator}, creator_name = #{creatorName}, lastupdate = #{lastupdate}, updator = #{updator}, updator_name = #{updatorName}, ver = #{ver}, vertime = #{vertime}, dept_id = #{deptId}, dept_path = #{deptPath}, delflg = #{delflg}, state = #{state}, xgfj = #{xgfj}, exp1 = #{exp1}, exp2 = #{exp2}, exp3 = #{exp3}, exp4 = #{exp4}, exp5 = #{exp5}, exp6 = #{exp6}, exp7 = #{exp7}, exp8 = #{exp8}, exp9 = #{exp9}, exp10 = #{exp10} WHERE owid = #{owid}
